avg_rating_query:
select round(avg(rating), 2) 
                    from review 
                    where instructor_first = %s 
                      and instructor_last = %s
instructor_courses_query:
select course_number 
                                      from course_section 
                                      where instructor_first = %s 
                                        and instructor_last = %s
instructor_departments_query:
select department_name 
                                          from instructor_to_department 
                                          where instructor_first = %s 
                                            and instructor_last = %s
instructor_reviews_query:
select comment 
                      from review 
                      where instructor_first = %s 
                        and instructor_last = %s
